name: GitHub
description: Granular GitHub tools for commit inspection, diffs, PR workflows, comments, and merge operations.

allowedRepos.description: Optional global allowlist for all GitHub operations (owner/repo).

writeAllowedRepos.description: Optional allowlist for write operations (comments, PR create/edit/close/update).

mergeAllowedRepos.description: Optional allowlist for merge operations only.

timeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each gh command.

maxFiles.description: Default max changed files included in commit/diff/PR file responses.

maxPatchChars.description: Default max characters returned for per-file patch text before truncation.
